p: Successful isolation of PEDV in Vero cells is increased when using intestinal contents/homogenates compared to faeces (Oka et al. 2014; Chen et al. 2014). ELISA tests based on polyclonal antibodies and MAbs are available for detection of PEDV antigens in faeces (Callebaut et al. 1982; Carvajal et al. 1995).
